alert.note: Alert for Floyd; Montgomery (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 21 at 3:17PM EDT by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Pulaski, northern Floyd and southwestern Montgomery Counties through 345 PM EDT... At 317 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Copper Valley, or over Indian Valley, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Christiansburg... Indian Valley... Pilot... Graysontown... Alum Ridge... Childress... and Merrimac. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
